purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 钧)
Pictophonetic: 匀 indicates the sound; 釒 (gold) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 匀 [ yún ] equal; even, uniform
heisig_chinese_memo: You use your metal cattleprod to keep your precious little 30 catties uniform and herding in the right direction.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You use you metal cattleprod to keep your precious little 30 catties uniform and herding in the right direction.
humanum_full_description_en:
After the change signifier " Lu " to " gold " to " Jun " word " uniform ", " Jun " The same old words. The font of Zihezi Keke changes from " Jin " to " Xun ", which has the same shape as the ancient text of Shuo Wen.

Bronze writing indicates a unit of weight, one jun thirty catties. Jifu pot: "Jin Shijun".

"Shuowen": "Jun, thirty catties. From Jin Yunsheng. Qian, ancient Wenjun from Xun."
humanum_short_description_en: " Jun " inscriptions from " Jin " from "螾", early inscriptions on inscriptions were only made of "銀" ("雲" in inscriptions from " Lu " (like the shape of golden cake) from "螾"), " uniform "is" Kwan beginning of the text "of.
humanum_full_description:
後改換意符「呂」為「金」，成「鈞」字，「勻」、「鈞」古同字。子禾子釜的字形從「金」從「旬」，與《說文》古文同形。

　　金文表示重量單位，一鈞三十斤。幾父壺：「金十鈞」。

　　《說文》：「鈞，三十斤也。从金勻聲。銞，古文鈞从旬。」
humanum_short_description: 「鈞」字金文從「金」從「螾」，早期金文只作「勻」(「勻」字金文從「呂」(象金餅之形)從「螾」)，「勻」是「鈞」的初文。

The font of Zihezi Keke changes from " Jin" to " Xun", which has the same shape as the ancient text of Shuo Wen. Bronze writing indicates a unit of weight, one jun thirty catties. Jifu pot: "Jin Shijun". "Shuowen": "Jun, thirty catties. From Jin Yunsheng. Qian, ancient Wenjun from Xun."

鈞字的基本解释

鈞
jūn
见“钧”。

鈞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jūn］
［《廣韻》居匀切，平諄，見。］
“钧1”的繁体字。“銁1”的今字。“銞1”的今字。
(1)古代重量单位之一。
(2)制陶器所用的转轮。
(3)即鼎。古代炊具。亦作立国的重器。有三足。
(4)调节乐音。
(5)指调节乐音的标准。
(6)乐调。
(7)衡量轻重、数量等。
(8)比喻国政。
(9)敬辞。用于对尊长或上级。参见“鈞慈”、“鈞聽”、“鈞令”。
(10)通“均”。相同。
(11)通“均”。相等。
(12)通“均”。均衡；均匀。
(13)通“均”。全，都。
(14)古代河流名。汉水支流之一。上、中游即今河南淅河，下游即汇合淅河以后的丹江。
(15)姓。汉有钧喜。见《广韵·平諄》引汉应劭《风俗通》。

鈞字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鈞； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1299第10
〔古文〕銞【唐韻】居勻切【集韻】【韻會】規倫切，?音均。【說文】三十斤也。【孟康曰】萬一千五百二十銖。【書·五子之歌】關石和鈞。【疏】三十斤爲鈞，四鈞爲石，鈞石所以一天下之重輕，而立民信也。　又【集韻】一曰陶旊輪。【正字通】陶人模下圓轉者爲鈞。【前漢·賈誼傳師古註】陶家名轉者爲鈞，蓋取周回調均之義。　又大鈞，天也。【前漢·賈誼傳】大鈞播物，坱圠無垠。【註】如淳曰：陶者作器于鈞上，此以造物爲大鈞也。言造化爲人，亦猶陶之造瓦耳。又【杜甫詩】八荒開壽域，一氣轉洪鈞。　又樂名。【張衡·西京賦】饗以鈞天廣樂，帝有醉焉。　又劒名。【淮南子·覽冥訓】淳鈞之器成。【註】淳鈞，古劒。　又地名。【左傳·昭四年】夏啓有鈞臺之享。【註】河南陽翟縣南有鈞臺陂。　又水名。【前漢·霍去病傳】涉鈞者。【註】鈞耆，水名。　又姓。【風俗通】楚大夫元鈞之後，漢有侍中鈞喜。　又與均同。平也。【詩·大雅】四鍭旣鈞。【註】矢鏃重羽輕，必參亭而三分之，一在前，二在後，得平均也。　又等也，同

Jun
Basic explanation of words
Jun
jūn
See "jun".
Jun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jūn］
["Guangyun" Juyun cut, smooth, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "钧1". The present character of "銁1". The present word for "銞1".
(1) One of the ancient weight units.
(2) The runner used in pottery.
(3) It is the tripod. Ancient cooking utensils. It is also a powerful weapon for the founding of the country. There are three legs.
(4) Adjust the music tone.
(5) Refers to the standard for adjusting musical tone.
(6) Music tune.
(7) Measure the severity, quantity, etc.
(8) A metaphor for national politics.
(9) Respect. Used for elders or superiors. See "Jun Ci", "Jun Ting", "Jun Ling".
(10) Through "equal". the same.
(11) Through "equal". equal.
(12) Through "equal". Balance; even.
(13) Through "equal". all.
(14) Ancient river names. One of the tributaries of the Han River. The upper and middle reaches are the Xihe River in Henan Province, and the lower reaches are the Danjiang River after the confluence of the Xihe River.
(15) Last name. Han has Junxi. See "Guangyun·Pingzheng" quoted Han Yingshao's "Fun Sutong".
Jun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　jun; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 1299-10
[Ancient text] Qian [Tang Yun] Juyun cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Rule Lun cut, all sounds. [Said the text] Thirty catties. [Meng Kang said] One thousand five hundred and twenty baht. 【Book·Song of Five Sons】Guan Shi and Jun. [Sparse] Thirty catties are Jun, four Jun is stone, Jun stone is the weight of the day, and the people are trusted.　[Jiyun] One said Tao Yanlun. 【Zhengzitong】Jun is the one who turns round in the pottery model. [Annotation to the predecessor of Jia Yi in the former Han Dynasty] The Tao’s name transfer was Jun, and the cover took the meaning of Zhou Jiayi.　Dajun again, heaven. [Previous Han·Jia Yi's Biography] Dajun broadcast material, 坱圠 endless. [Note] Ru Chun said: The potter's craftsman is Yu Jun, and the creation is the great Jun. Words made of human beings are also like pottery to make watts. [Du Fu Poetry] The Eight Wastes Opened the Shou Territory and turned to Hong Jun in one fell swoop.　Also known as music. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] With Jun Tian Guang Le, the emperor is drunk.　 Another name. 【Huainanzi·Lan Ming Xun】Chun Jun's implement. [Note] Chunjun, Gu Xi.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·4th Year of Zhao] Xia Qi has the enjoyment of Juntai. [Note] There is Juntaibei in the south of Yangdi County, Henan.　Also known as water. [Previous Han Huo Qubing Biography] A member of the Jungle. [Note] Jun Qi, the name of water.　Another last name. [Customs and Customs] After the doctor of Chu Yuan Jun, the Han had served Zhong Junxi.　The same with Jun. Ping also. 【Poetry·Daya】Si Yaojun Jun. [Note] The arrowheads are heavy and light, so they must go to the pavilion and one-third, one in the front and the second in the back.　Wait again, the same
